blocks.name: df-oppr
blocks.content: Define an opposite ring, which is the same as the original ring but with multiplication written the other way around. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: opprval
blocks.content: Value of the opposite ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)

thm opprval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(coppr, c1))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2)))), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqtri(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2))), cfv(coppr, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(coppr, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, coppr, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2))), co(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0))))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)))), c1, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  opeq2d(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0))), ctpos(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  tposeqd(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmulr, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmulr, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cmulr)
  df-oppr(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(coppr, c1), co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, coppr)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2)))
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c2))))
}

thm opprval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(√ó ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(oppR ` c1)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 =(c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), c3 =(Base ` c1))
  eqtri(c0, (c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), (oppR ` c1))
  pm2.61i((oppR ` c1)=(c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, coppr, (c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), (hs0[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` hs0))>))
  oveq12d(hs0, csts, <(√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` hs0))>, c1, <(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>, hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  opeq2d((√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` hs0)), tpos(c2), hs0 = c1)
  tposeqd((√ó ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((√ó ` hs0), c2, (√ó ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cmulr)
  df-oppr(hs0)
  ovex(c1, csts, <(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  eqtr4d((oppR ` c1), (c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>), emptycls, ¬¨ c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c1, coppr)
  ovprc1(c1, csts, <(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>)
  reldmsets()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c2)>))
}

thm opprmulfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(c0, ctpos(c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmulr, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(coppr, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c4))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, ctpos(c1), cfv(cmulr, c4))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmulr, c4), ctpos(c1)), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl6reqr(cfv(cmulr, c4), ctpos(c1), cfv(cmulr, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c1)))), wcel(c3, universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c3, universe), wceq(ctpos(c1), cfv(cmulr, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c1))))), wcel(ctpos(c1), universe))
  tposex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmulr, c3)
  setsid(c3, universe, ctpos(c1), universe, cmulr)
  fveq2i(cmulr, c4, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(c1))))
  opprval(c4, c3, c1, c2)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cmulr, c4), ctpos(c1), cfv(cmulr, emptycls), ctpos(emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  eqtr2i(cfv(cmulr, emptycls), ctpos(emptycls), emptycls)
  tpos0()
  str0(cmulr, cfv(cmulr, cnx))
  mulrid()
  fveq2d(cmulr, c4, emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c4, emptycls, cfv(coppr, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, coppr)
  tposeqd(c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cmulr, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cmulr)
}

  ‚ä¢ c0 = tpos(c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c3)

  ‚ä£ c4 =(oppR ` c3)

} = {

  tposex(c1)

  setsid(c3, universe, tpos(c1), universe, cmulr)
  fveq2i(cmulr, c4, (c3[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos(c1)>))
  opprval(c4, c3, c1, c2)

  eqtr2i((√ó ` ‚àÖ), tpos(‚àÖ), emptycls)

  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (√ó ` c3), ¬¨ c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c3, cmulr)
}

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ opprbas and ~ oppradd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm opprlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(coppr, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cslot(c3))
  -| wcel(c3, cn)
  -| wbr(c3, clt, nat3)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c0, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, c1))))))
  setsnid(c0, c1, cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, c1)))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir(wne(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cnx)), wne(c3, nat3))
  ltneii(c3, nat3)
  nnrei(c3)
  neeq12i(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cmulr, cnx), c3, nat3)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  mulrndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, co(c1, csts, cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ctpos(cfv(cmulr, c1)))))
  opprval(c2, c1, cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opprlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(oppR ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 = Slot(c3)
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï
  ‚ä£ c3[<]3
} = {
  eqtr4i((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), (c0 `(c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` c1))>)))
  setsnid(c0, c1, (√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` c1)))
  ndxid(c0, c3)
  mpbir((c0 ` ndx)‚â†(√ó ` ndx), c3 ‚â† 3)
  ltneii(c3, nat3)
  nnrei(c3)
  neeq12i((c0 ` ndx), (√ó ` ndx), c3, nat3)
  ndxarg(c0, c3)
  mulrndx()
  fveq2i(c0, c2, (c1[sSet]<(√ó ` ndx), tpos((√ó ` c1))>))
  opprval(c2, c1, (√ó ` c1), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((√ó ` c1))
}
